verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I once had a sword Or should I say, it once had me I just picked it up Oh what a sword It was plus three

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Its ego was twelve A fact of which I wasn't aware I tried to leave And I found that the sword didn't care Oh, oh, oh

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I walked through the halls Wasting my time Nothing to find Then I turned around And then I said "Oh no, undead"

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: The thirty two knights saw me coming And started to laugh I closed my eyes As my sword started hewing a path Oh, oh, oh

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: And when I awoke I was alone That sword had flown Now I use a club Isn't it good No-Ego wood
